name: When Will We Travel Again - Frequent Flyer Survey - May 2020
description:
I recently published a survey out to subscribers here on YouTube, followers on Twitter (@JebBrooks) and Instagram (@JebBrooksFlies). These people represent frequent flyers and in this video I’ll share some of the results of that survey.

As a disclosure, I’m not a data scientist, survey expert, or statistician, but I still think there’s some interesting data here worth sharing.

If you’d like me to conduct the survey again in the coming weeks to see how attitudes have shifted, please let me know in the comments. Also, if you have ideas about what to ask in the next round of this survey, I’d appreciate that input, too!

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel! 
http://www.JebBrooksFlies.com 

Check me out on Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooksflies 

Check me out on Twitter, too:
https://twitter.com/jebbrooks

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog: 
https://greenergrass.com/ 

Here's a link to the "World Famous Island Hopper Video!"
https://youtu.be/r1cON15Av1M

And to the unedited take-off and landing footage from that flight:
https://youtu.be/1v-rGMptWcY

Music:
Deep and Abiding (Instrumental Version) – Dayon
Remember (Instrumental Version) - Dayon
